description:

title: Halo: Combat Evolved - Part 3 | The Road to Infinite with Nick & Amy
description:
Amy has never played the Halo series so Nick and Amy are going to play through the entire Halo series, starting with Reach and ending at 5, before Halo Infinite releases this Winter. Welcome to The Road to Infinite.
